attributes.action: Increase the Job Seekers Allowance to a realistic amount for the 21st Century
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to request an increase in Job Seekers Allowance. I was recently made redundant of which I could do nothing about but down to the poor state of the economy I along with many others now have to survive on a paltry £60.50 a week. Please increase this figure Prime Minister I did not choose to be unemployed but because of poor banking I now have to struggle to pay my bills.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
